title: My friends do drugs. Recreational drugs won’t hurt me.
content:
Answer: **FALSE!** Drugs can negatively affect your life for a long time, and possibly permanently. Think twice before joining your friends. If it’s not possible to spend time with them without doing drugs, it is probably best for you to consider meeting new friends or starting new hobbies.
 
Check out these sports groups and activity clubs near you: *[LOCAL INFO]*
